pages.text: Ingredients are items that can be obtained and are mainly used to make other food items. However, some of these items can also be consumed, granting special effects.
This item can be made from any type of mushroom.
Maple Syrup can be obtained from a $(l:yeastnfeast:blocks/tree_tap)Tree Tap$(). When consumed, it cleanses the player of Mining Fatigue.
Molasses can be obtained from Sugar Canes. When consumed, it cleanses the player of Mining Fatigue.
Milk Bottles can be obtained from Milk Buckets. When consumed, it cleanses the player of a single negative effect.
